text: ara amara niscaya'i tadera paricalita karatama sahaja-sathika pathe. Ara ye ke'u allahâ€Œra o rasulera ajnapalana kare, -- era'i tabe rayeche tamdera sange yamdera upare allah niyamata pradana karechena -- nabiganera madhya theke, o satyaparayanadera o saksyadatadera ebam satkarmidera, -- ara erama hacchena sarbangasundara bandhubarga.
